pullRequest.body:
I need these lemmas to prove that Moore graphs of girth 5 are strongly regular.

pullRequest.title: feat(Combinatorics/SimpleGraph): Provide iff statements for distance equal and greater than 2

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Combinatorics/SimpleGraph): Distance between `u` and `v` is one iff `u` and `v` are adjacent
